entry.title: AeroPads - Pads & Soundscapes
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$190.00 â†’ $90.00 [$90.00 ~ $190.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼š$90.00

App å…§è³¼è²·

  • Orbit Packï¼š$150.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now weâ€™re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. â€¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesnâ€™t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time youâ€™ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. â€¢ Intense, immersive narrative â€“ Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novelâ€™s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. â€¢ A rich Lovecraftian world â€“ Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraftâ€™s tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... â€¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal â€¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened â€¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit â€¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on â€œContact usâ€ at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine. Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours. Create Your Vibe: Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds â€“ Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it. Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks. Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast. Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme. Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*. Add Your Personal Touch: Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Welcome to RadarOmega, the next-generation weather app that takes high-resolution weather data to a whole new level. More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm. Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. RadarOmega and cyclonePORT work closely with universities, emergency managers, broadcast meteorologists, and more to provide solutions for relaying critical weather information when life-threatening weather situations are imminent. RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea. Base Application -NEW Warning Display Dialog -NEW Hi-Res Storm Relative Velocity -MRMS Reflectivity -Hi-Res Single Site Radar Data -30 Frames of Data -7 Day Radar History -Lightning Detection/Animation -24 Hour Storm Reports -SPC Convective Outlooks & Watches -NHC Tropical Suite & Hurricane Hunter -WPC Excessive Rainfall Outlooks -Mesoscale Discussions (Severe, Winter, & Precip.) -CPC Temp. & Precip. Outlooks -Fire Weather Outlooks & Drought Monitor -WPC Winter Forecasts & WSSI -METARS -Real-Time NWS Storm-Based Warnings -Non-Precip Watches/Warnings for USA -Flash Animation & In-App Sound Alert for All Alerts -WPC Surface Analysis -Buoy Data & Tide Forecasts -NEXRAD Hail History -Spotter Network Locations -Power Outage Layer -Map Type Customization -Detailed City & Road Network -15 Custom Locations with a Linked RadarOmega Account -Drawing, Data Viewer, & Distance Tools -Storm Track Drawing Tool -Share Screenshot & Video -Push Notifications for All Storm-Based Watches/Warnings Using GPS Location -Access to cyclonePORT Network Gamma -Hi-Res Satellite Data -Lightning Detection/Animation, METARS, & GLM for Mesoscale & Storm-Based Satellite Sectors -National Digital Forecast Database -Access to Project MesoVort -75 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar with 30 Frames -Smoothing for Radar/Satellite -30 Day Radar History -6 Month Storm Report Archive -3D Radar/Satellite -Upload 3 Custom Color Tables -30 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -2 Custom Location Lists -Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts Using GPS Location ONLY (max of 8 at a time) Beta *Everything in Gamma PLUS* -MRMS Data -150 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar/Satellite with 50 Frames -Smoothing for MRMS -90 Day Radar History -5 Year Storm Report Archive -3D MRMS -Upload 8 Custom Color Tables -75 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -5 Custom Location Lists Alpha *Everything in Beta PLUS* -Volumetric Radar -Model Data with Contours for HRRR, NAM3KM, NAM12KM, RAP, GFS, ECMWF, HWRF, & HMON -250 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar/Satellite with 100 Frames -Quad View Radar/Satellite on iPad & Desktop with 50 Frames -Smoothing for Models -90 Day Radar History -10 Year Storm Report Archive -Upload 30 Custom Color Tables -150 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -10 Custom Location Lists -1 Site Lightning Monitoring with Custom Range Zones -Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts for up to 3 Custom Locations and GPS Locations (max of 8 at a time) Additional Add-Ons -Rapid Sweep Subscriptions are maintained through the iOS App Store. We will work with our customers however, refunds must be done through the iOS App Store. Please be sure to reach out to our support team if you have any problems, questions, or concerns. For Support- You can create a ticket and we will resolve it as soon as possible: https://radaromegawx.supportbee.io/portal/sign_in See our Terms of Service below: https://www.radaromega.com/terms.php
